template.name: Template SNMP Ubiquiti AirOS Station
template.description: Zabbix Template for Ubiquiti AirOS v6.x.

item.name: Device uptime
item.description: The time since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.

trigger.expression: ({Template SNMP Ubiquiti AirOS Station:ifOperStatus.5.last(0)}=2) and ({Template SNMP Ubiquiti AirOS Station:ifAdminStatus.5.last(0)}=1)
trigger.name: Link down on {HOSTNAME} ath0

trigger.expression: ({Template SNMP Ubiquiti AirOS Station:ifOperStatus.2.last(0)}=2) and ({Template SNMP Ubiquiti AirOS Station:ifAdminStatus.2.last(0)}=1)
trigger.name: Link down on {HOSTNAME} eth0
{HOSTNAME} Firmware out of date {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
trigger.description: Firmware is out of date on {HOSTNAME}! Current Firmware version: {ITEM.LASTVALUE} < 6.1.3.
